ISSUE.TITLE: API: add GET method for /bankaccounts/{id}/lines/{line_id}/links
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Feature Request Add an endpoint to list the links of a bank entry. ### Use case At the moment it's not possible to link invoices to bank entries through the API. We are missing the payments endpoints and also we can't read the links of a bank entry (even though we can create them). As a first step, I'd like to add an endpoint to get the bank entry links. ### Suggested implementation Add a method to `/compta/bank/class/api_bankaccounts.class.php` ### Suggested steps _No response_

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #26935 from frederic34/patch-4 fix phpstan
